statements: UPDATE financial_portfolio SET total_value = 15000.00 WHERE portfolio_id = 1;
UPDATE financial_portfolio SET risk_level = 'Medium' WHERE portfolio_id = 2;
UPDATE financial_portfolio SET stress_test_result = TRUE WHERE portfolio_id = 3;
UPDATE financial_portfolio SET total_value = total_value + 1000 WHERE portfolio_id = 1;
UPDATE financial_portfolio SET risk_level = 'High' WHERE total_value > 50000;
UPDATE financial_portfolio SET stress_test_result = true WHERE portfolio_name LIKE '%Tech%';
UPDATE public.financial_portfolio SET risk_level = 2 WHERE portfolio_id = 1;
UPDATE public.portfolio_assets SET asset_value = 1500.00 WHERE asset_id = 3;
UPDATE public.financial_portfolio SET stress_test_passed = true WHERE portfolio_id = 2;
UPDATE public.financial_portfolio SET risk_level = 5, stress_test_passed = TRUE WHERE portfolio_id = 1;
UPDATE public.portfolio_assets SET asset_value = 10000 WHERE portfolio_id = 1 AND asset_id = 1;
UPDATE public.financial_portfolio SET portfolio_name = 'New Portfolio Name' WHERE portfolio_id = 2;
UPDATE portfolios SET portfolio_name = 'New Portfolio Name' WHERE portfolio_id = 1;
UPDATE assets SET asset_value = 1500.50 WHERE asset_id = 1;
UPDATE risk_analysis SET stress_test_result = 'Low Risk' WHERE analysis_id = 1;
UPDATE portfolios SET start_date = '2023-01-01' WHERE portfolio_id = 1;

UPDATE risk_analysis SET stress_test_result = 'High Risk' WHERE analysis_id = 3;
UPDATE financial_portfolio SET total_value = 15000.50 WHERE portfolio_id = 1;
UPDATE asset SET asset_value = 5000.75 WHERE asset_id = 2;
UPDATE risk_analysis SET risk_score = 8.75 WHERE analysis_id = 3;
UPDATE financial_portfolio SET total_value = total_value + 500 WHERE portfolio_id = 1;
UPDATE asset SET asset_value = asset_value * 1.1 WHERE asset_type = 'Stocks';
UPDATE risk_analysis SET risk_score = risk_score - 1.5 WHERE analysis_date > '2022-01-01';
UPDATE Portfolio SET total_value = 5000 WHERE portfolio_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Portfolio SET total_value = 6000 WHERE portfolio_name = 'Investment';
UPDATE Portfolio SET portfolio_name = 'Growth Portfolio' WHERE portfolio_id = '78901234-5678-9012-3456-789012345678';

UPDATE Portfolio SET total_value = total_value - 500 WHERE total_value > 10000;
UPDATE Portfolio SET total_value = total_value + (SELECT SUM(total_value) FROM Portfolio);
